incident_updates.body: Start time : 28/06/2022 20:00 UTC Service impact : Backbone links between Europe and North America are currently down. Some customers may face some latency. Ongoing actions : Our tams are investigating and working with our provider provider for a quick resolution.
Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.
